direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods create and add a new element to the current element, but at different positions (end vs. start).
Both methods append content to the current element, but one appends an element and the other appends text.
Both methods add a child node to the current element, but appendElement specifically creates and adds an Element node.
Both methods involve inserting child nodes into the current element, but insertChildren allows for more flexible positioning.
The appendElement method relies on the creation of an Element, similar to the createElement method, which is a dependency.
